name: House Invasion
description:
Story

You wake up to a strange noise in your house, while investigating, you find the horrible truth of what is going on in your house and in the whole world. 

My friend and I made this game for computer science. As a fan of Analog horror, I wanted to try and make a game about it that is a little different than other Analog games. This game is still in devolpment and our plans are to make this an FPS game (like Resident Evil). We are both beginners and are still learning, so don't expect bugless gameplay while playing.
